title: Victorybit1
author: Victorybit1
content: Please I want to make an enquiry.I would like to know if it's okay for some of us that are into Administrative virtual assistant to seek for clients here? Is it against the forum rules? I offer administrative support to individuals and business owners.Job description include:Data entryEmail managementScheduling meetings and AppointmentsWeb researchCanva design and basic social media.Payment in Bitcoin.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Nope, it's not against forum rules to offer such services as you just did.You will learn that bitcointalk generally offers more freedom than any other forum around.

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Any services you offer is fine to be posted here, as long as it is not illegal to your or/and your client's country (I assume it is also applied to services although from the rules, 'goods' is specified). Oh, here are the list forum rules which you might want to go over.Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQ.

comments.author: Victorybit1
comments.body: Quote from: Rikafip on April 11, 2023, 09:34:01 AMNope, it's not against forum rules to offer such services as you just did.You will learn that bitcointalk generally offers more freedom than any other forum around.  Thanks for the response. I really do appreciate.

comments.author: Victorybit1
comments.body: Quote from: Eureka_07 on April 11, 2023, 10:06:12 AMAny services you offer is fine to be posted here, as long as it is not illegal to your or/and your client's country (I assume it is also applied to services although from the rules, 'goods' is specified). Oh, here are the list forum rules which you might want to go over.Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQ. Thanks for sharing the links to the rules. Though I have gone through it earlier when I just joined, I have more clarity now. I appreciate

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: You would not be in violation of forum rules but you should lay out your plans and offers clearly in order to increase chances of success. As a newbie you will not be able to add images to your posts but if they were quoted the images will at least appear.Wish you success  Quote from: Victorybit1 on April 11, 2023, 09:01:29 AMPlease I want to make an enquiry.I would like to know if it's okay for some of us that are into Administrative virtual assistant to seek for clients here? Is it against the forum rules? I offer administrative support to individuals and business owners.Job description include:Data entryEmail managementScheduling meetings and AppointmentsWeb researchCanva design and basic social media.Payment in Bitcoin.

comments.author: joeperry
comments.body: Hi, it's not against the forum to offer your service but we would like to give you an advise that if you add a previous experience or little more information about yourself or improving your thread a little bit by adding design, images, etc. that would probably give you a higher chance of finding a clients here.Good luck!
